downloader.action.addToQueue: Add selected tasks to the queue
downloader.confirm.deleteTask: Are you sure to delete it?
downloader.tip.allowDuplicateDesc: In general, it's not necessary to create identical tasks.
downloader.tip.autoRetryDesc: Retry automatically when the downloading task failed.
downloader.tip.checkpointManual: You can set the previous downloading checkpoint manually to make the downloader start the downloading task from it.
downloader.tip.checkpointAuto: In most cases, you should let this field set by downloader automatically.
downloader.tip.checkpointFormat: Each downloader has its own checkpoint format, and invalid checkpoint data will be ignored. You can find samples on our online document.
downloader.tip.checkIntervalDesc: The interval (in seconds) after download completion or failure before restarting the task. Generally used for downloading content that updates periodically.
Default path where downloads will be sav: Default path where downloads will be saved
Request interval help: Wait time between each request to avoid too frequent requests
Define how downloaded files should be na: Define how downloaded files should be named
Set a page range if you don't want to do: Set a page range if you don't want to download them all.
downloader.tip.preferTorrentDesc: If available, download torrent files instead of downloading images directly.
downloader.tip.exHentaiUserscript: You can use our Tampermonkey userscript to download from ExHentai with one click.
